title: WB Viewport Web Component
description: Schema for wb-viewport custom element attributes

width.description: Custom width in pixels (for custom viewports)

show-controls.description: Whether to show viewport control buttons

overlay.description: Whether to show viewport overlay indicator

custom-viewports.description: JSON string containing custom viewport definitions

label.description: Label text for the viewport simulator

disabled.description: Whether the viewport controls are disabled

onchange.description: JavaScript code to execute when viewport changes

onreset.description: JavaScript code to execute when viewport is reset

onwb-viewport:change.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-viewport:change event

onwb-viewport:reset.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-viewport:reset event

onwb-viewport:ready.description: JavaScript code for custom wb-viewport:ready event

aria-labelledby.description: ID of element that labels this viewport

aria-describedby.description: ID of element that describes this viewport

aria-live.description: How screen readers announce viewport changes

role.description: ARIA role for the viewport component
